"LOC"
LackOfCohesion - class net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.LackOfCohesion.
Calculates the Lack of Cohesion of Methods (LCOM*) metric using the Henderson-Sellers method (See book page 147): (avg(m(a)) - m)/(1 - m) where m(a) is the number of methods that access a.
LackOfCohesion() - Constructor for class net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.LackOfCohesion
Constructor for LackOfCohesion.
LackOfCohesion.Preferences - class net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.LackOfCohesion.Preferences.
Statically cache preference values, yet register for change events so they get updated when they change.
LackOfCohesion.Preferences() - Constructor for class net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.LackOfCohesion.Preferences
